title: Kotak to buy IDBI Bank? RBI identifies eligible bidders for state bank's stake sale
description: The Reserve Bank of India has approved Fairfax Financial Holdings, Emirates NBD, and Kotak Mahindra Bank as bidders for a majority stake in IDBI Bank. The Indian government and Life Insurance Corp plan to sell 60.7%. Approved bidders will receive access to IDBI Bank's private data after evaluation. Bid submissions are expected by the end of the fiscal year.
